title: Video Roundup: From Pro MTB to Pro High Alpine Tubing? Plus GBDURO, A Dog’s Life & more!
content:
From humour and good times to full-commitment races and big jumps, this week’s video roundup has a bit of everything for everyone. The Gardners kick things off with a funny video about what they’re pursuing beyond the cycling world, and the Transition crew shows us how to throw a proper company outing! The fun and

author: Steve Fisher
